00051     IOHandlerData(int sd, struct sockaddr_in &addr, DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) 
00052       : IOHandler(sd, addr, dhp), m_request_cache(), m_send_queue() {
00053       m_connected = false;
00054       reset_incoming_message_state();
00055       m_id = atomic_inc_return(&ms_next_connection_id);
00056     }
00057 
00058     void reset_incoming_message_state() {
00059       m_got_header = false;
00060       m_message_header_remaining = sizeof(Header::HeaderT);
00061       m_message = 0;
00062       m_message_ptr = 0;
00063       m_message_remaining = 0;
00064     }
00065 
00066     int send_message(CommBufPtr &cbufPtr, time_t timeout=0, DispatchHandler *dispatchHandler=0);

00072 #elif defined(__linux__)
00073     virtual bool handle_event(struct epoll_event *event);
00074 #else
00075     ImplementMe;
00076 #endif

00078     bool handle_write_readiness();
